titlestmt.titleproper: University of Connecticut, Athletic Communications Office Records 1999.0054
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Betsy Pittman and Nicola Shayer.

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-09-06T12:12-0400

did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, Athletic Communications Office Records

repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: The office is responsible for the creation and distribution of information pertaining to University athletics. It began as a department within the Office of Public Information, Sports Information.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: University of Connecticut. Athletic Communications Office.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: Established in the Office of Public Information as the Office of Sports Information, the responsibilities were transferred to the Division of Athletics in the 1970s.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains publications, media guides, statistics, correspondence, press releases, clippings and similar materials associated with athletics at the University of Connecticut.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Note: only the information on archery and baseball has been integrated into this collection. Please contact the curator for information on other University affiliated sports.
The materials are arranged by sport and chronologically therein.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: The following materials have been separated from the collection and cataloged:
UConn Vs. UMass, 1938; UConn vs Maine, 1940 1999-0054.vr108

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], University of Connecticut, Athletic Communications Office Records. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred originally from the Office of Public Information. Subsequent additions have been transferred from the Athletic Communications Office.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the Reading Room desk.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes information on Eastern Archery Association and the 25th Olympic Bowman League.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes information on the Freshman, JV, and Varsity teams from 1896-2003 including program brochures, publications, scorebooks, statistics, press releases, and batting and fielding records. It also includes information on collegiate conferences attended, including the Yankee Conference as well as the NCAA from 1949-1998.

did.unittitle: American Association of College Baseball Coaches

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes items such as press releases, boxscores, freshman information, weekly records, statistics, schedules, rosters and news clippings ranging in years from 1947-2011, though this may not be inclusive. It also includes information on collegiate conferences attended, including the NCAA and Big East tournament.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes items such as press releases, boxscores, statistics, schedules, rosters and news clippings ranging in years from 1974-2011.It also includes information on collegiate conferences attended, including the NCAA and Big East tournament.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes items such as press releases, statistics, schedules, rosters and news clippings ranging in years from 1954-1996.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes items such as press releases, statistics, schedules, rosters and news clippings ranging in years from 1978-2003, though is not inclusive.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes items such as press releases, scores, records and championships ranging in years from 1949-1962.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes items such as press releases, statistics, schedules, rosters and news clippings ranging in years from 1974-2003, though is not inclusive.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes items such as press releases, boxscores, statistics, schedules, opponents, awards, rosters and news clippings ranging in years from 1894-2010. It also includes information on the 100 years of football, the upgrade to Division I, and collegiate conferences attended, including the NCAA and the Yankee Conference. Programs for individual games are arragned chronologically and date from 1928-1989.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes items such as press releases, schedules, rosters, scores, publicity forms, and news clippings ranging in years from 1974-2003, though this may not be inclusive.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes items such as press releases, results, news articles and scores, records and information on indoor and outdoor teams as well as Yankee Conferences. The dates of this series range from 1949-2003, but may not be inclusive.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes items such as results, news articles and scores, and team records.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes items such as press releases, schedules, rosters and news clippings ranging in years from 1975-2003, though this may not be inclusive.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series includes general clippings of most sports ranging from 1988 to 2006.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series is arranged alphabetically by sport and then chronologically therein.
